reference.title: cxxClassAPIItemLocation
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxClassAPIItemLocation> element is defined within <cxxClassDefinition>. <cxxClassAPIItemLocation> specifies the location of the API.

section.title: Description

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxClassAPIItemLocation> <cxxClassDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxClassDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="775"/> <cxxClassDefinitionFile name="filePath" value="D:/src/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxClassDefinitionFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="765"/> <cxxClassDefinitionFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="787"/> </cxxClassAPIItemLocation>
